channel.title: Cluster on Alessandra [Ali] Valcarcel
channel.description: Recent content in Cluster on Alessandra [Ali] Valcarcel

item.title: Using the CCEB High Performance Computing Cluster
item.description: Introduction Iâ€™ve worked on imaging data for about 4 years now. Imaging data is too large to run analyses on a personal computer so when I began working in the field I was forced to learn how to use the Penn Medicine Academic Computing Services High-Performance Computing Cluster (Penn HPC). I love coding but this was a whole new language and way to think about coding and the learning curve was steep.
